TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed LogoutAction extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Indicates the page that the user will be directed to when he or she logs out of the Web site.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LogoutAction> enumeration members indicate the action taken when the user logs out of the Web site using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control.
## Examples The following code example shows how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutAction%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LogoutAction> enumeration.
<!-- TODO: review snippet reference [!code-csharp[LoginStatusLogoutAction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLogoutAction/CS/loginstatuslogoutactioncs.aspx#1)] --> <!-- TODO: review snippet reference [!code-vb[LoginStatusLogoutAction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLogoutAction/VB/loginstatuslogoutactionvb.aspx#1)] -->

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.LogoutAction Redirect = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Redirects the user to a specified URL.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.LogoutAction RedirectToLoginPage = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Redirects the user to the login page defined in the site's configuration files (Machine.config and Web.config).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.LogoutAction Refresh = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Reloads the current page with the user logged out.
